name: Ascend: New Gods
description:
Ascend: Hand of Kul is a free-to-play fantasy action RPG. The three gods are in conflict after a prophecy foretells one becoming supreme over the others, but only once the Titans are defeated. Players play one of the warrior class Caos in the role of a champion to their chosen god, fighting to defeat the Titans.

Your god will grant you abilities mirroring his or her power - Darkness, Light, or Void- as you pledge to quest and slay in service to the god and for the glory of your legacy. As players advance in their god's service, they can earn prestige, experience, and abilities in a journey to Ascension and possibly beocming the ultimate warrior. The game features single player gameplay and a parallel multiplayer experience. While players cannot directly compete or play cooperatively, they can send others blessings or curses.
